    Multi-Channel Potentiostat
    Electrochemical Analyzer

    Electrochemical Analyzer-Simulator
    (Simulator of chemical sensor, Potentiostat)

    ECAS100

    • Replaceable and Editable Chip
    • 5.0 Color touch panel
    • Simulation of chemical sensor for off-line use
    • Electrochemical analyzer and potentiostat

    • Play Vidio
      Open Vimeo video

      Complete electrochemical functions

      • Electrochemical Analyzer（ECA）

      • CV (Cyclic Voltammetry)

      • LSV (Linear Scan Voltammetry)

      • SWV (Square-Wave Voltammetry)

      • DPV (Differential Pulse Voltammetry)

      • IT (Amperometry)

      • OCP (Open-Circuit Potential)

      Play Vidio

      • Multiple Interfaces

      Traditional electrode and Screen Printed Electrode are available

    • Off-line Mode is Available for Used Alone

      5.0 Color touch panel
      used alone without the PC

    • Simulation-Chip Test Mode

      Edit program freely, replaceable chip

      Whether you are developing a prototype of a product or creating a standard test method, you can use our simulation function.You can edit electrochemical scanning method,detection duration,enrichment time, correction curve and so on freely and then burn it to the chip, you can complete the test with one key without computer, and read the results directly on the screen.

      • It only takes 4 steps to complete process editing
        (Procedure / Data analysis / Concentration transfer / Action to burn-in)

      • Each ECA methods can be edited interchangeably
        (CV / LSV / SWV / DPV / IT)

      • Match up the sample injection status for interchangeable editing
        (Wating for sample / Wating for second / Wating for trigger button)

      Play Vidio

    • Great for Products Development

    • Develope medical device- glucose meter

      Play Vidio

      Develope measuring equipment-pH meter

      Play Vidio

    Main Function(A)ECA(Electrochemical Analyzer) with On-line
    (B)ECAS(Electrochemical Analyzer Simulator) with Off-line
    Characteristic(A)ECA/ECAS mode change
    (B)ECAS for application in real smample testing with off-line
    (C)Flexble edit program for operation of ECAS with off-line
    (D 5.0 color touch panel for display the result of ECAS with off-line
    Electrochemical
    Methods    		(A)cyclic Voltammetry(CV)
    (B)Linear Scan Voltammetry(LSV)
    (C)Square Wave Voltammetry(SWV)
    (D)Differential Pulse Voltammetry(DPV)
    (E)Amperometry(IT)
    (F)Open Circuit Potential - Time(OCP)
    Range(A)Voltage range: +2~-2(V)
    (B)Current range: 10-3~10-9(A)
    (C)Data records number in ECAS mode: 100 data records
    Operation systemwindow XP above
    Power input5V, 1600mA
    Sensor connector color(A)Green color - Working electrode(WE)
    (B)Red color - Counter electrode(CE)
    (C)White color - Reference electrode(RE)
    Size of machine193(L) x 112(W) x 43(H) mm

    Note1：Simulation function-The test steps can be burned into a replaceable chip, so a large number of test samples can be tested offline, and the required values can be read directly on the panel .That will simulate the process of product model development.
